name: György Szauer
introduction: Programming is my main hobby. I like to design and create software solutions which are reliable, secure and UX friendly. My specialization focused on Frontend side to discover and develop among the cutting edge technologies. During my freetime happy to develop in different stack to extend knowledge.
summary: Professional fullstack experience with a focus on Frontend stack Typescript, Angular (>8 years)
Focus provide value for user (heavy UX considerations), while keep code clean and maintainable for long term
Value communication, teamwork and knowledge sharing
Home projects in SolidJS, Tailwindcss, Game development, hybrid mobile development (JS focused)

work_experience.responsibilities: Project in Finance about managing and trading structured product solutions. Investment application which handles automatic trades between issuers and end clients. Using gRPC for BE communication, and Angular for frontend.

Working as Scrum Master with 20% of my working time to support my team. Organizing agile ceremonies, analyzing the ongoing performance, collaborating with product owners and give techincal support for stories.

Working on two projects in parallel. One of them is creating and managing the company website which is based on React + Contentful stack supported by AWS CloudFront. The second application was based on Angular. We use Scrum and Jira for organizing the tasks.

Developing Angular applications with Express and MongoDB on microservices. Continuous development and TDD to support quality. Reactive programming with a functional approach characterizes the code style.
Managing multiple projects, providing a small team with technical support. Silverlight C# Web application, AngularJS web application with Bootstrap framework for the UI.
Creating and managing internal web pages (PHP5, Python2.x backend). Fortran to C++ migrations. Mentoring with script languages (Javascript, Python).
Testing and monitoring bug issues for Cubby web / desktop hybrid application, as well as creating reports for performance follow-up on release-based testing.
During my early school period, I worked as a part-time fullstack developer. Most used technologies: PHP5, MySQL, Symphony, Bootstrap, and JQuery / ExtJS for the UI.

education.degree: Computer Science - Specialization in Software Development

certifications.certification: ISTQB - Foundation Certificate in Software Testing

programming_interests: Application development in Angular or React environment, elaborating with Reactive programming and functional approaches in JavaScript along with TypeScript. Also interested in mobile/desktop hybrid applications.
hobbies: I swim and do martial arts. Interested in psychology, body language, the human brain in subconscious states during hypnosis. My daily reading includes people/team management as well as self-development.
